gw.api.contact

Class ProximitySearchPageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ProximitySearchPageHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageHelper

    public class ProximitySearchPageHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements PageHelper
    Helper for Address Book pages and provides session-specific utility functions for pages which need proximity search functionality. This includes some pages not in the Address Book tab, such as those used for Admin and Assignment User searches.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper
      An helper class used to assemble dropdowns for selecting the radius or nearest-n for a search.

      • paramsFor

        public ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper paramsFor(Bean bean)

        Parameters:
        bean - normally the page's SearchCriteria, this is used to select a particular set of dropdown parameters.
        Returns:
        the parameters for a specific set of Search Criteria.

      • proximitySearchParameterRange

        public ProximitySearchParameters[] proximitySearchParameterRange(int[] numbers,
                                                        java.lang.String[] unitOfDistanceTypeKeys,
                                                        java.lang.Boolean[] isDistanceBased,
                                                        Bean bean)
        Generates the dropdown for selecting the parameters for a proximity search. The dropdown is used to select a radius or number of n-nearest search items.

        Note that the three arrays must be of equal size, and all three values must be set.

        Parameters:
        numbers - an array of integers representing the set of selectable values for this search
        unitOfDistanceTypeKeys - an array of strings (type keys) indicating the unit of distance for each of the set of numbers for this search
        isDistanceBased - an array of Booleans indicating whether selectable value for this search is distance based (by radius) or ordinal (by nearest n)
        bean - normally the page's SearchCriteria, this is used to select a particular set of dropdown parameters.
        Returns:
        a ProximitySearchParameters array containing the drop-down parameters
